agent_utterance: Tonight’s micro-goal: choose one small, easy-to-digest bite and a quick grounding move. Options: 1) 150 g of yogurt with a few berries or sliced banana, 2) a small banana with a teaspoon of peanut butter. Pair with water or a cool herbal tea. Aim for about 150–200 kcal total and eat slowly over 5–10 minutes, then log it right away. After eating, try a 2-minute box breathing (inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4, repeat 4 times) to ease anxiety. If you’re very hot or tired, you can simplify to the yogurt and water and still log it. This aligns with a moderate effort target (around 4.1 on your scale).
